label: 中衛府
対訳語: Headquarters of the Middle Imperial Guards
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: In charge of guarding the Imperial Palace (Kinchū). It was soon abolished and its guards incorporated in the other Headquarters of the Guards (Efu). [禁中、衛府]
